title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Introducing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors - the ultimate solution to keep snakes and other unwanted animals away from your yard, lawn, garden, and outdoor areas! 

With its advanced Ultrasonic technology, this snake repellent emits powerful sonic pulses every 30 seconds, creating an environment that snakes simply can't tolerate. The coverage area spans an impressive 7000 sq. ft., ensuring that every corner of your outdoor space remains snake-free.

Crafted with premium quality materials, this repellent is built to last, providing you with maximum durability. Its solar-powered design means you never have to worry about replacing batteries or running out of power. Plus, with an IP44 waterproof rating, it can withstand various weather conditions, ensuring continuous protection.

Safety is a top priority, and this snake repellent is safe for children and pets. It is chemical-free, making it an environmentally friendly and humane solution to keep unwanted animals at bay. 

Not only does this repellent effectively repel snakes, but it also works against a wide range of animals such as deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels. It's a versatile solution for all your outdoor pest problems.

The effectiveness of this repellent lasts for 2-4 weeks, giving you long-lasting protection. Its sonic pulse interval of 3-4 seconds ensures continuous deterrence. With a frequency of 400+/-100Hz, it creates an unpleasant environment for snakes and other animals, driving them away from your property.

Installation is a breeze - simply place the repellent 2 inches above the soil and let it do its job. For optimal performance, charge the repellent in the sun for 4-5 hours before use. 

Don't let snakes and unwanted animals ruin your outdoor experience. Get the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors today and enjoy a snake-free environment in your yard, garden, and outdoor spaces.
